sense.def:
To stumble
pomeni, da se med hojo ali tekom zapletemo in skoraj pademo.

seg.quote: The man was drunk and he stumbled on the bottom step.

sense.def:
To stumble while speaking
pomeni, da se med govorjenjem zmotimo, tako da moramo narediti premor in besedo povedati še enkrat.

seg.quote: She stumbled over the foreign words.

sense.def:
To stumble across something
ali
to stumble on it
pomeni, da nekaj odkrijemo nepričakovano.

seg.quote: In the course of their search they may stumble across something quite different.
Sir Alexander Fleming stumbled on his great discovery of penicillin by accident.
